name: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow Bundle
description:
Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow is a puzzle platformer, where you will embark on a touching journey through the surreal world of a person's mind as a young Griffin and his faithful bear, Birly. Overcome challenges, avoid traps and defeat enemies to help the man find peace.

The bundle includes the following:
  • Full version of the game
  • Official OST
